languages.text: "Слишком смелое заявление для того, кто еще ни разу не лишался души".

traits.locale_text: "Слишком смелое заявление для того, кто еще ни разу не лишался души".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."
languages.original_text: "Слишком смелое заявление для того, кто еще ни разу не лишался души".

traits.locale_text: "A bold statement from someone who has not forsaken his soul even once yet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A bold statement from someone who has not forsaken his soul even once yet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Valientes palabras para tratarse de alguien que todavía no ha renunciado a su alma ni una sola vez».
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: «Valientes palabras para tratarse de alguien que todavía no ha renunciado a su alma ni una sola vez».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “大放厥词。明明从来都没舍弃过自己的灵魂，居然还敢发这样的誓。”
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: “大放厥词。明明从来都没舍弃过自己的灵魂，居然还敢发这样的誓。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà qui est bien audacieux, de la part de quelqu'un qui n'a encore jamais damné son âme. »
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui est bien audacieux, de la part de quelqu'un qui n'a encore jamais damné son âme. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「まだ一度も己の魂を捨てたことのない者にしては、大胆な発言だな」
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: 「まだ一度も己の魂を捨てたことのない者にしては、大胆な発言だな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Eine verwegene Aussage von jemandem, der seine eigene Seele noch nicht ein einziges Mal aufgegeben hat."
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: "Eine verwegene Aussage von jemandem, der seine eigene Seele noch nicht ein einziges Mal aufgegeben hat."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhundan bir kez bile vazgeçmemiş birine göre yürekli bir ifade."
languages.original_text: "A bold statement from one who has not yet forsaken his soul even once."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhundan bir kez bile vazgeçmemiş birine göre yürekli bir ifade."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
